page.title: 10ROYAL ASCOT LADIES DAY
page.content: On Thursday of Royal Ascot Week it is Ladies Day.On this day all the ladies dress up in fancy hats and dresses and the men wear top hats and tails.The Queen also comes on this day along with many of the Royal Family.Many famous people like Terry Wogan,Bruce Forsyth and Matthew Kelly come along too.That week there were a lot of helicopters taking people to and from the Races.Most people come to the races for enjoyment.It turns out that almost everyone comes by car,but a few came by train.We found out that a majority of people have been coming for more than 10 years.Most people spend up to Â£50 on their day at Ascot.Quite a few people bet on the horses but not many spend over Â£50.Peolpe had come from all over the world to the races.
